Member Function Documentation

◆ RegisterListener()

template<typename T >
static EventListenerHandle discpp::EventHandler< T >::RegisterListener ( const std::function< void(const T &)> &  listener)
inlinestatic

Registers an event listener.

The given event class must derive from discpp::Event

discpp::EventHandler<discpp::ChannelPinsUpdateEvent>::RegisterListener([](discpp::ChannelPinsUpdateEvent event)->bool {
event.channel.Send("Detected a pin update!");
return false;
});
Parameters
[in]listenerThe code to execute when the event gets dispatched.
Returns
discpp::EventListenerhandle

◆ RemoveListener()

template<typename T >
static void discpp::EventHandler< T >::RemoveListener ( const EventListenerHandle &  handle)
inlinestatic

Removes an event listener.

The given event class must derive from discpp::Event.

auto eventListen = discpp::EventHandler<discpp::ChannelPinsUpdateEvent>::RegisterListener([](discpp::ChannelPinsUpdateEvent event)->bool {
event.channel.Send("Detected a pin update!");
return false;
});
discpp::EventHandler<discpp::ChannelPinsUpdateEvent>::RemoveListener(eventListen);
Parameters
[in]handleThe event listener to remove.
Returns
void

◆ TriggerEvent()

template<typename T >
static void discpp::EventHandler< T >::TriggerEvent ( const T &  e)
inlinestatic

Triggers an event.

The given event class must derive from discpp::Event. The event will be thrown on another thread.

discpp::EventHandler<discpp::MessageCreateEvent>::TriggerEvent(discpp::MessageCreateEvent(created_message));
Parameters
[in]eThe event to trigger.
Returns
void
